entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:59 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Longue-Pointe-de-Mingan 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
